The hero using this weapon increases their bonus to attack rolls by 1!
Abandoned Storeroom.name: 废弃储藏室 Abandoned Storeroom

Trapped Hallway.name: 陷阱走廊 Trapped Hallway
Trapped Hallway.text:
这条短走廊里有个简单的陷阱。当英雄们进入走廊时，大声朗读以下内容。

这条短走廊两侧是光滑的石墙，两端各有一扇门，不过远端的门是关闭的。地面铺设着大块的方形石砖。

这个走廊里有个简单的陷阱，会把天花板上的石块砸向那些不注意脚下的英雄们！

简单陷阱 Simple Trap

@Actor[Z9ggO7spfHwr8up1]

当英雄们初次进入这个走廊时，要求每个玩家进行一次@Check[perception|dc:20]检定。如果有人成功，则他们就会注意到最靠近北门的那个方格有点奇怪，好像那块地砖有点松动，并怀疑那里可能有陷阱。如果他们知道陷阱在那里，英雄就能通过一次@Check[thievery|dc:18]检定来解除装置（Disable a Device），方式可以是卡住地砖，或撑住天花板。如果他们检定成功，陷阱被解除，英雄们可以正常通过走廊。如果他们检定失败，也可以继续进行尝试，直到他们设法解除为止——但如果他们大失败，则陷阱会触发，天花板会砸在他们身上！

如果没有人注意到陷阱，那么当英雄首次踩到触发器——靠近北门的那个方格时，陷阱就会做出反应。触发时，陷阱会让天花板上的石块落下砸向英雄；以走廊里每名英雄为目标，各进行一次远程打击。如果这些打击中任何一次造成重击，则像其他打击一样造成双倍伤害。之后，陷阱不会再造成任何危害，英雄们可以继续进行探索。

经验值 Experience Points

无论英雄们成功解除了陷阱，还是仅仅承受了陷阱造成的伤害，都奖励他们每人8XP。



原文:

This short hallway contains a simple trap. When the heroes enter this hallway, read the following aloud.

This short hallway has smooth walls of worked stone with a door at either end, though the door at the far end is closed. The floor is tiled with large, square stone tiles.

This hallway contains a simple trap that drops stone blocks onto heroes who don't watch their step!

Simple Trap

@Actor[Z9ggO7spfHwr8up1]{Falling Ceiling}

When the heroes first enter this hallway, ask each player to roll a @Check[type:perception|dc:20]{Perception Skill Check}. If anyone succeeds, they notice something strange about the square closest to the northern door, as though the floor tile were a little loose, and suspect that it might be trapped. If they know the trap is there, a hero can roll a @Check[type:thievery|dc:18]{Thievery Skill Check} to Disable a Device, either by jamming the floor tile or by bracing the ceiling. If they succeed, they disarm the trap and the heroes can move through the hallway normally. If they fail, they can keep trying until they manage to disable the trap—but if they critically fail, the trap goes off and the ceiling falls on them!

If no one notices the trap, its reaction happens the first time a hero steps on the trigger: the square closest to the north door. When triggered, the trap drops stone blocks from the ceiling onto the heroes, making one Ranged Strike against each hero in the hallway. If any of these Strikes are critical hits, they deal double damage, just like any Strike. Afterwards, the trap poses no further harm, and the heroes can continue their exploration.

Experience Points

Whether the heroes disable the trap or simply endure the damage it deals, award them each 8 XP.

Introduction.text:
第一场冒险

《奥塔里 Otari之下的威胁》旨在教导新任游戏主持人和玩家如何游玩《开拓者》。本冒险的每个部分都会在你需要时引入新概念，并逐步为游戏加入更多内容。与此同时，其他玩家各自拥有一位完整的英雄可供扮演，在探索他们所身处的危险世界时，学习如何运用自身能力并取得成功。

如果你是游戏主持人，并且想立刻与朋友开玩，那么就从这个冒险开始吧。它会带着你和其他玩家一步步了解如何游玩，让你们有机会一同学习。如果你不打算马上开跑，这本日志也是学习如何担任 GM 的绝佳起点。

选择一位英雄

本冒险被设计为由四位 1 等级英雄游玩，但只需做少量微调，也同样适用于两到三位英雄。每位玩家应从@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.FM2SxBvhjufkiW44]{预设英雄 Pregenerated Heroes}中挑选一位，或依照@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{创建角色}讲义中的步骤自行创建英雄。

如果你计划以开拓者协会的组织化游戏形式来主持本团，还应确保你已核对@UUID[.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{开拓者协会}讲义中的相关信息。

给玩家 10–15 分钟浏览他们的角色卡，以便了解角色如何运作。在这段时间里，你应通读导言以及@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{第一场遭遇}，为主持做好准备。如果你有额外的时间，也可以阅读@UUID[JournalEntry.S1UnJk4t55aRFaCs.JournalEntryPage.ZFjG6Np42VRz5hFu]{遭遇}规则以作预习。

开始游戏

当你的玩家选好英雄后，你就可以进入下一步——为冒险做好设定！@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.QFVMina0vPQXKUxC]{设置场景 Setting the Scene}页面包含了在玩家正式深入地下城之前，你需要分享的全部信息。



原文:

The First Adventure

"Menace under Otari" is designed to teach new Game Masters and players how to play Pathfinder. Each section of the adventure will teach new concepts as you need them, adding more and more to the game. Meanwhile, the other players each have an entire hero to roleplay as, learning how to use their abilities and how to succeed in the dangerous world that they find themselves exploring.

If you're the Game Master and you want to play with your friends right now, start with this adventure. It walks you and the other players through how to play, giving you a chance to learn together. If you don't want to play right away, the journal is a great starting place to learn more about being a GM.

Choosing a Hero

This adventure is designed to be played by four 1st-level heroes, but it will work for two or three heroes with only a few slight adjustments. Each player should pick one of the @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.FM2SxBvhjufkiW44]{Pregenerated Heroes}, or build their own hero following the steps in the @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{Character Creation} handout.

If you are planning on running the game for Pathfinder Society organised play, you should also ensure that you have verified the information within the @UUID[.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{Pathfinder Society} handout.

Give the players 10-15 minutes to look over their character sheets so they can learn how their characters work. During this time, you should read through the introduction and @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{first encounter} to get ready to run it. If you have extra time, you might also want to read the @UUID[JournalEntry.S1UnJk4t55aRFaCs.JournalEntryPage.ZFjG6Np42VRz5hFu]{Encounters} rules in preparation.

Getting Started

When your players have chosen their heroes, you're ready to move on to the next step- setting up the adventure! The @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.QFVMina0vPQXKUxC]{Setting the Scene} page has all the information you need to share before your players dive into the dungeon proper.
Introduction.name: 介绍 Introduction

Gold Puzzle.name: 金币谜题 Gold Puzzle
Gold Puzzle.text:
这个房间里有一个谜题。如果英雄们解决了这个谜题，他们可以获得额外的宝藏，让他们的探索更为安全！当英雄们进入这个房间时，大声朗读以下内容。

通往这个房间的门无声地滑开，露出一间狭长的房室。房间一侧的两个角落里立着两尊祭司石像，面朝一尊高大的男子雕像；那雕像双手伸出，掌心向上。雕像前方是一座石质祭坛，其上放着九枚金币。一个声音从雕像中轰隆响起：
“在我的手中，我裁断一切财富的价值，必将抬起更高者。这些金币中有一枚是欺骗。仅用两次裁断找出它，便可得我的祝福。”

对雕像感兴趣的玩家可以尝试一次@Check[religion|dc:10]技能检定。若成功，他们知道这座雕像描绘的是财富与文明之神阿巴达尔。

谜题 The Puzzle

雕像与金币构成一个谜题。此处的挑战是辨认出哪一枚金币是假的。它们看起来完全相同，重量也完全一致，但这枚假金币的价值比其他的更低。向玩家解释：当英雄将金币放入雕像的双手时，雕像会抬起价值较高的那只手。因此，如果英雄们在每只手里各放四枚金币，而右手中包含假币，那么雕像将抬起左手。进行两次尝试后，雕像会要求英雄指出哪一枚是假的。

如果他们未能识别出假金币，所有金币都会消失，并以随机顺序重新出现在祭坛上。若金币被从祭坛上拿走而未放入雕像手中，它们同样会消失，谜题重置。任何被加入此谜题的真金币会立刻消失，并被送入@UUID[.gz9x5HmzjSvvBLQp]的金库中。英雄们可以无限次重试。未解开该谜题不会阻止英雄完成冒险，但会因为@UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]中的陷阱，使下一场战斗略微更具挑战性。

如果他们成功，真金币会落到地面，英雄可以将其作为宝藏取走（每枚价值1 gp），而假金币则会变成铅块。此外，通往区域10的门会缓缓开启（你可以点击暗门将其打开来揭示该区域），这让英雄获得进入阿巴达尔宝藏的许可，并允许他们调整区域11的陷阱，使其对自己有利。

在为玩家主持此谜题时，告知玩家他们必须决定如何称量编号为1到9的金币，并由你暗中选定哪个编号代表假币。若他们未能识别假币并决定重试，则需改选一个新的编号（因为谜题已重置）。玩家也可能在未真正解出谜题的情况下误打误撞选中假币，这也无妨——冒险者有时就是会走运！为简化此谜题，你可以提供一些道具，例如画有金币并标注1到9编号的纸片。

解法 The Solution

解开该谜题的诀窍，是将九枚金币分成三组，每组三枚。把其中一组各三枚分别放入两只手，第三组留在祭坛上，玩家就能判断假币在哪一组：若一只手抬起，则另一只手中的那一组包含假币；若两只手都不抬起，则假币在留在祭坛上的那组三枚之中。接着，英雄需要对含有假币的那一组重复此过程：两手各放一枚，第三枚留在祭坛上。若一只手抬起，则另一只手里的那枚是假的；若两只手都不抬起，则祭坛上的那枚为假币。

经验值 Experience Points

并非所有挑战都很危险！如果英雄解开了谜题，奖励他们每人80 XP。



原文:

This chamber contains a puzzle. If the heroes solve the puzzle, they can gain extra treasure and make their explorations safer! Read the following aloud when the heroes enter this room.

The door to this chamber silently glides open to reveal a long room. Two stone statues of priests stand in the corners along one side of the room, facing a towering statue of a man holding out both of his hands, palms up. In front of this statue is a stone altar holding nine golden coins. A voice booms out from the statue.
"In my hands I judge the value of all wealth, raising up whichever is greater. One of these coins is a deception. Find it using only two judgments and receive my blessing.”

Players curious about the statue can attempt a @Check[type:religion|dc:10]{Religion Skill Check} skill check. On a success, they know the statue depicts Abadar, the god of wealth and civilization.

The Puzzle

The statue and the coins represent a puzzle. The challenge here is to identify which of the coins is fake. All of them look identical and they all weigh exactly the same, but the fake coin is worth less than the others. Explain to the players that when the heroes place coins in the statue’s hands, it will raise the hand that has a higher value. So if the heroes put four coins in each hand and the right hand contains the fake, the statue will raise the left hand. After two attempts, the statue asks the heroes to identify the fake.

If they fail to identify the fake coin, all the coins vanish and reappear in a random order atop the altar. If the coins are taken from the altar and not placed in the hands, they also vanish and the puzzle resets. Any real coins added to the puzzle vanish immediately, added to the vault in @UUID[.gz9x5HmzjSvvBLQp]{Area 10}. The heroes can try again as many times as they’d like. Failing to solve this puzzle doesn’t prevent the heroes from completing the adventure, but it does make the next combat a bit more challenging because of the trap in @UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]{Area 11}.

If they succeed, the real coins fall to the floor and the heroes can take them as treasure (each is worth 1 gp), while the fake coin turns to lead. In addition, the door to Area 10 slowly swings open (you can reveal this area by clicking on the secret door to open it), which gives the heroes access to Abadar’s treasure and allows them to adjust the traps in Area 11 to work in their favor.

When running this puzzle for the players, tell the players they must decide how they want to weigh coins numbered 1 through 9, and secretly pick which number represents the fake coin. If they fail to identify the fake coin and decide to try again, pick a new number (since the puzzle resets). The players might accidentally pick the fake coin without solving the puzzle, and that’s okay—adventurers get lucky sometimes! To make this puzzle simpler, you might want to provide props, like pieces of paper with a coin drawn on each one, numbered 1 through 9.

The Solution

The trick to solving the puzzle is to split the coins into three groups of three coins each. By placing one group of three in each hand and leaving the third group on the altar, the players can determine which group contains the fake coin. If one hand rises, the other hand contains the fake. If neither rises, then the fake is in the three coins that were left on the altar. The heroes then need to repeat this process with the group containing the fake, by placing one coin in each hand and leaving the third on the altar. If one hand rises, the coin in the other hand is the fake. If neither rises, the coin on the altar is the fake.

Experience Points

Not all challenges are dangerous! If the heroes solve the puzzle, award them each 80 XP.

Abadar’s Vault.name: 阿巴达尔的宝库 Abadar’s Vault
Abadar’s Vault.text:
通往这个房间的门是石质的，不可能打破或强行打开。打开这扇门的唯一方法是解决@UUID[.bpVEaN8PUCgbuJvk]中的谜题。如果玩家完成了这一壮举，大门就打开了。在这种情况下，大声朗读下面的句子。

这个小房间里有一个装饰着钥匙符号的旧木箱。在箱子后面是一台由齿轮与滑轮组成的巨大装置，看起来像是某个看不见的装置的内部构造。

这个房间内有阿巴达尔的祝福，以及用于控制@UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]中陷阱的机关。

尽管英雄们初次进入时房间一片昏暗，他们仍能看见北侧墙壁上透出细小的光束。墙上的小孔让他们能窥视区域11。在该区域的远端有一名狗头人在站岗。若英雄们倾听，他们能听见几名不在视线内的狗头人低声交谈的片段，提到“老大的新宠物”以及关于“上面的镇子”的计划。

阿巴达尔的祝福 Abadar's Blessings

@Actor[8PgsPDw5TjD2dUTr]

未上锁的箱子里有阿巴达尔的祝福。里面有一堆钱币、一张卷起的羊皮纸，以及一个装着单颗祖母绿的小玻璃盒。钱币包括214 cp、22 sp与3 gp，外加英雄们在区域9的谜题中失去的任何钱币。英雄们也可以将这颗祖母绿以20 gp出售。

这张羊皮纸是一张力场飞弹卷轴。奥术或异能施法者（例如标志性法师艾兹伦）可以使用这张卷轴来施放力场飞弹法术，而无需消耗法术位，甚至不需要预备该法术。使用后，卷轴会化为尘埃。

控制机关 Control Mechanism

如果一名英雄检查箱子，他会注意到箱子背后伸出一根杠杆。让其进行一次@Check[crafting|dc:15]检定。若英雄成功，他会意识到该机关控制着一个隐藏在区域11的陷阱，但从这里无法确切得知陷阱如何触发或会造成什么效果。

杠杆目前设置在“解除”位置。若英雄将其拨到“启动”位置，区域11的陷阱就会被激活。

经验值 Experience Points

有时，英雄们可能会因为采取行动让之后更容易而获得XP。若英雄们找到杠杆并将其设置为激活陷阱，则每名英雄因这项成就获得30 XP。



原文:

The door leading into this chamber is made from stone, making it impossible to break or force open. The only way to open this door is to solve the puzzle in @UUID[.bpVEaN8PUCgbuJvk]{Area 09}. If the players accomplished this feat, the door is open. In that case, read the following aloud.

This small chamber contains an old wooden chest emblazoned with the symbol of a key. Behind the chest is a massive contraption of gears and pulleys that looks like the inner workings of some unseen device.

This chamber holds the blessings of Abadar and the control mechanism for the traps in @UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]{Area 11}.

Although the room is dark when the heroes first enter, they can see tiny shafts of light coming from the wall on the north side. Tiny holes in the wall allow them to peek into Area 11. On the far side of this area is a kobold, standing watch. If the heroes listen, they can hear fragments of a quiet conversation between a few other kobolds, out of sight, talking about "the boss's new pet" and plans for "the town above."

Abadar's Blessings

@Actor[8PgsPDw5TjD2dUTr]{Abadar's Vault}

The unlocked chest contains the blessing of Abadar. Inside is a pile of coins, a rolled-up piece of parchment, and a small glass box containing a single emerald. The coins consist of 214 cp, 22 sp, and 3 gp, plus any coins that the heroes lost to the puzzle in Area 9. The heroes can also sell the emerald for 20 gp.

The piece of parchment is a scroll of force barrage. An Arcane or Occult spellcaster (like the iconic wizard, Ezren) can use this scroll to cast the spell force barrage without expending a spell slot or even having it prepared. Once used, the scroll crumbles to dust.

Control Mechanism

If a hero examines the chest, they notice a lever protruding from the back of it. Have them roll a @Check[type:crafting|dc:15]{Crafting Skill Check} check. If the hero succeeds, they realize that this mechanism controls a trap hidden in Area 11, though from here they can’t tell precisely how the trap is triggered or what it does.

The lever is currently set to the “disarmed” position. If the heroes set it to the “active” position, the trap in Area 11 activates.

Experience Points

Sometimes the heroes might earn XP for taking actions to make things easier later on. If the heroes find the lever and set it to activate the trap, give them each 30 XP for their accomplishment.

Kobolds and Traps.name: 狗头人和陷阱 Kobolds and Traps
Kobolds and Traps.text:
这个房间里有更多带鳞片的蜥蜴般类人生物——狗头人，外加两种致命的陷阱。当英雄们进入这个房间时，大声朗读以下内容。

门嘎吱一声打开，露出一个巨大的房间，看起来像一座觐见大厅。远处，一道宽阔的楼梯向上通往一处可能曾经摆放过王座的位置。柱子支撑着高高的天花板，曾经用于装饰的旗幡如今已破烂不堪，却仍挂在柱上。房间中央的地面上，一处装饰性瓷砖图案从覆盖地面的污垢中隐约显露出来。

致命陷阱 Deadly Traps

这次遭遇包括两种不同的陷阱，它们可能会攻击角色——甚至狗头人！当一名英雄第一次移动到某个陷阱区域旁边时，让该英雄进行一次察觉检定。若其结果高于该陷阱“察觉（Notice）”条目中的DC，则该英雄会注意到陷阱，并能避开该区域。

如果他们知道陷阱的位置，紧邻某个陷阱区域的英雄可以花费2个动作进行一次贼活检定以解除该危害。此检定的DC列在陷阱的“解除（Disable）”条目中。记住：如果他们大失败，陷阱会立刻触发！

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[4Axci50gPQArPg7d] @Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]{狗头人战士 Kobold Warriors (2)} @Actor[j8qD2LVDSP2lhLUO] 

中间矛陷阱 Central Spears

这个房间里的第一个陷阱是中间矛陷阱。此陷阱只有在英雄将@UUID[.gz9x5HmzjSvvBLQp]的拉杆设置为“启动”时才会生效；否则，它没有效果。

这个陷阱会影响此房间地面的一部分。若陷阱处于启动状态，第一个踏上白色边框所圈定区域内任一块地砖的生物将触发陷阱——而最可能的倒霉蛋是狗头人，因为它们并不知道英雄已经启动了陷阱！陷阱从西侧墙壁射出长矛，对每一列中最先进入的生物进行一次远程打击。不同于先前的陷阱，这个陷阱拥有“重置（Reset）”条目：若未被解除，它会在1分钟后重置，并在下一次有生物进入圈定区域时再次发射。

陷阱大师的圈套 Kobold Snares

狗头人陷阱大师也有她自己的陷阱——她能布置圈套，作为可移动的陷阱使用。她将它们设置在楼梯顶部、位于圈定区域东侧的三个方格上。你可以使用@Actor[X1ZVzivrcAqbNDq2]来标记它们的放置位置。一旦布置完成，这些圈套可以被解除，但无法重复使用——一旦触发，就不再构成威胁。

狗头人战术 Kobold Tactics

这里驻扎着两名狗头人战士，以及一名狗头人陷阱大师。三个狗头人都接到命令，确保没有任何人能抵达下方的狗头人巢穴。

狗头人听见门开启时的吱呀声，因此英雄一踏入房间，狗头人就已经准备好战斗。为狗头人战士与陷阱大师分别掷先攻（使用察觉）。

战斗开始时，两名战士分列通往下方的螺旋楼梯两侧，但会在各自的第一回合开始时移动，以封锁楼梯。若英雄使用区域10中的控制装置启动了中间矛陷阱，则狗头人在移动进入圈定区域以封锁楼梯的那一刻就会触发该陷阱。更多信息见上方《中间矛陷阱 Central Spears》。

狗头人陷阱大师留在原地，第一轮将用完她的所有动作来布置最后一个小型尖刺陷阱（当PC进入房间时，另外两个已经布置好了）。当最后一个陷阱布置完成后，她会在英雄接近前用长矛从远处攻击英雄。

经验值 Experience Points

若克服本房间中的狗头人与危害，为每位英雄奖励136 XP。

奇怪的珠宝 Strange Jewelry

击败狗头人后，玩家可以检查倒下的敌人。狗头人的道具列在他们的数据表中。

狗头人陷阱大师戴着一条特殊的项链：一条简单的铜链，串着一片破裂的大蛋壳碎片。蛋壳呈象牙色，但其上有诡异的绿色脉络。碎片直径仅约3英寸，但它所来自的蛋至少有2英尺宽。即使英雄将这碎片带回镇上，也无人能辨认出究竟是哪种生物会产下如此巨大的蛋；不过塔米莉推测，这可能来自一只巨型海龟或另一种爬行动物。英雄稍后将在地下城中有机会了解更多关于这枚怪蛋的线索。

前往下层 Going Down?

击败狗头人后，英雄可以拿走他们的随身物品（在每个生物的数据表中注明）。英雄在房间里找不到其他宝藏，但还有另一个出口：房间后方的螺旋楼梯向下延伸，通往更深的地底。

这是英雄休息、恢复法术与生命值，再继续前进的好时机。你应提醒他们这一选择，并鼓励他们返回奥塔里汇报发现。他们也可以利用这段时间出售已获得的宝藏，并购买额外的道具。

如果英雄向塔米莉报告在洞穴中出没的鳞片生物，她会因渔场下方发现的情况而震惊，并恳求英雄继续深入，终结这场威胁。她能辨认这些生物是狗头人——体型矮小的爬行类人形生物，喜爱陷阱，且常为更强大的生物效力。她还指出，失踪的鱼远远超过几只狗头人能吃下的数量。塔米莉担心城下还有某种更加饥饿的东西，并将自己的忧虑告诉英雄。

如果玩家在本次冒险中吃了不少苦头，你也可以借此机会给予一些帮助。塔米莉为了应急存放了两瓶@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.2RuepCemJhrpKKao]。一名英雄饮用其中一瓶后，会立刻恢复[[/r 1d8[positive]]]点生命值。若英雄同意继续深入探索，塔米莉会很乐意将两瓶药水都交给他们。

更换场景 Changing Scenes

 

当玩家准备继续下楼时，你需要把他们的指示物移动到下一层。用鼠标拖拽框选玩家指示物，然后按ctrl+c复制（macOS为cmd+c）。接着，右键点击@UUID[.??]{第二层 Floor 2}地图并选择“Activate（激活）”。

场景加载完成后，移动到地图南侧的@UUID[.2KRdW68qNXeJ6JpN]，将鼠标悬停在楼梯附近的区域上，然后按ctrl+v粘贴（macOS为cmd+v）以将玩家指示物放置到位。



原文:

This chamber holds more of the scaly lizard-people called kobolds, plus a pair of deadly traps. When the heroes enter this room, read the following aloud.

The door opens with a creak, revealing a massive chamber that looks like an audience hall. On the far side, a broad set of stairs leads up to where a throne might once have been. Pillars support the high ceiling, and the ruined tatters of once decorative banners still hang from them. A decorative tile pattern centered in the middle of the room shows through the grim coating the floor.

Deadly Traps

This encounter includes two different kinds of traps that might attack the characters—or the kobolds! The first time a hero moves next to a trapped area, have them roll a Perception check. If their total is higher than the DC in the Notice entry for that trap, the hero notices the trap and can avoid that area.

If they know the trap’s location, a hero next to a trapped area can spend 2 actions to roll a Thievery check to disable that hazard. The DC of this check is listed in the trap’s Disable entry. Remember, if they critically fail, the trap goes off!

Encounter

@Actor[4Axci50gPQArPg7d]{Kobold Trapmaster} @Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]{Kobold Warriors (2)} @Actor[j8qD2LVDSP2lhLUO]{Central Spears} 

Central Spears

The first trap in this chamber is the central spears trap. This trap is active only if the heroes set the lever in @UUID[.gz9x5HmzjSvvBLQp]{Area 10} to “active.” Otherwise, it has no effect.

This trap affects part of the floor in this chamber. If the trap is active, the first creature to step on a floor tile in the white-outlined area triggers the trap—and it’s most likely the kobolds, who don’t realize the heroes have activated the trap! The trap shoots spears from the western wall, making a ranged Strike against the first creature in each row. Unlike the earlier trap, this trap has a Reset entry—if it’s not disabled, it resets after 1 minute and fires again the next time a creature moves in the outlined area.

Kobold Snares

The kobold trapmaster also has traps of her own- snares which she can set up as mobile traps. She sets them on the three squares located at the top of the stairs just to the east of the outlined area. You can use the @Actor[X1ZVzivrcAqbNDq2]{Spike Trap} actor to mark where they were placed. Once set up, these snares can be disarmed, but they can’t be reused—once they go off, they’re no longer a threat.

Kobold Tactics

Two kobold warriors are stationed here, along with a kobold trapmaster. All three kobolds have orders to make sure that no one reaches the kobold lair below.

The kobolds hear the door creak as it opens, so as soon as the heroes enter the room, the kobolds are ready to fight. Roll initiative (using Perception) for the kobold warriors and the trapmaster separately.

The two warriors start the combat at either side of the spiral staircase leading down, but they move to block the stairs at the start of their first turn. If the heroes activated the central spears trap using the control mechanism in Area 10, the kobolds set off that trap the moment they move into the outlined area to block the stairs. See Central Spears above for more information.

The kobold trapmaster stays where she is, spending all of her actions on the first round to lay down her last small spike trap (the other two are already down when the PCs enter the room). Once the final trap is placed, she uses her spears to attack the heroes from afar until they approach.

Experience Points

For overcoming the kobolds and the hazards in this room, give each hero 136 XP.

Strange Jewelry

After defeating the kobolds, the players can examine their fallen foes. The kobolds’ gear is listed in their stat blocks.

The kobold trapmaster is wearing a special necklace: a simple copper chain and a cracked piece of a large eggshell. The shell is ivory in color, but it has strange green veins running through it. This piece is only about 3 inches across, but the egg it came from must have been at least 2 feet wide. Even if the heroes take this piece back to town, no one can identify what sort of creature would lay such a massive egg, although Tamily speculates that it might have come from a giant turtle or another reptile. The heroes have the chance to learn more about this strange egg later in the dungeon.

Going Down?

After defeating the kobolds, the heroes can take their belongings (noted in each creature’s stat block). The heroes won’t find other treasure in the room, but there’s another exit: the spiral staircase in the back of the room descends even deeper into the earth.

This is a great time for the heroes to rest and regain their spells and Hit Points before pressing onward. You should remind them of this option and encourage them to head back up to Otari to report what they discovered. They can also use this time to sell any treasure they’ve found and purchase additional gear.

If the heroes report to Tamily Tanderveil about the scaly creatures creeping around the caverns, she’s shaken by the story of what they found underneath her fishery, and she implores the heroes to press on to put an end to this menace. She can identify the creatures as kobolds, small reptilian humanoids who have a fondness for traps and are often seen in the service of more powerful creatures. She also notes the amount of fish that has gone missing is far greater than what could have been eaten by a handful of kobolds. Tamily is worried that there’s something far hungrier beneath the city, and she shares her concern with the heroes.

If the players have had a particularly hard time with the adventure thus far, you can also use this opportunity to give them a bit of help. Tamily has a pair of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.2RuepCemJhrpKKao]{Potions of Healing} stored away in case of emergency. A hero who drinks one of these potions immediately regains [[/r 1d8[positive]]] Hit Points. Tamily gladly gives both potions to the heroes if they agree to continue their exploration.

Changing Scenes

 

When your players are ready to proceed downstairs, you'll need to move their tokens down. Select the player tokens by dragging a box over them, and copy the tokens by pressing ctrl+c (cmd+c for macOS). Then, activate the Floor 2 map by right clicking on it and choosing "Activate".

Once the scene finishes loading, move to @UUID[.2KRdW68qNXeJ6JpN]{Area 12: Kobold Lookouts} in the south of the map, hover your mouse over the area near the stairs, and press ctrl+v (cmd+v for macOS) to paste the player tokens in place.

Kobold Lookouts.name: 还是狗头人和陷阱 Kobold Lookouts
Kobold Lookouts.text:
第二层 Floor Two

地牢的第二层比第一层的挑战更加危险。在探索这一层的过程中，玩家将了解到失踪的鱼背后的真相。城市下方的一伙狗头人最近孵出了一条长角的雏龙，并一直袭击奥塔里渔场 Otari Fishery，以便为它们日渐长大的幼龙提供稳定的食物来源。若英雄们不能击败这股威胁，这条龙长大后可能会给奥塔里 Otari带来法术般的毁灭！

如果玩家希望击败狗头人——以及那条龙——就必须用上所有的技能和能力。如同第一层的情况，除非特别说明，否则这一层的房间都没有照明。狗头人都具有黑暗视觉，因此几乎不需要光源。

如果你还没有这么做，请启用地图的第二层，让玩家将注意力集中到那里，并把英雄的指示物放在该区域的楼梯上。

狗头人准备了这个房间来防御任何入侵者，并派驻两名更有本事的守卫把守此处。由于它们正躲藏着，先不要展示它们的指示物。当英雄们走下螺旋形楼梯时，大声朗读以下内容。

楼梯螺旋向下深入地底，最后通向一间房间；这里看起来像是专门为防御入侵者而准备的。房间一侧，一张桌子被翻倒用作掩蔽；另一侧，板条箱和木桶被堆叠起来，形成第二道屏障。

躲藏的狗头人 Hidden Kobolds

狗头人斥候在本次遭遇开始时处于躲藏状态。让每位玩家告诉你他们的察觉DC：察觉+10。然后投掷1d20并加上狗头人的潜行。如果总和等于或高于英雄们最高的察觉DC，那么在狗头人发动攻击前，英雄们不会注意到它们——房间看起来空无一人！在狗头人发动攻击、从路障后移动出来，或直到某位英雄绕过路障、位置足以看见躲藏的狗头人为止，都不要在地图上展示它们的指示物。但如果任何英雄的察觉DC高于狗头人潜行检定的总和，那么狗头人就会被发现！这时在地图上展示它们的指示物。

无论结果如何，都让玩家投掷先攻（除非某位英雄在躲藏，否则使用察觉）。狗头人的先攻使用其潜行检定的结果。如果有英雄的回合在狗头人之前开始，但狗头人成功躲藏，那么英雄知道附近有敌人，却不知道位置——他们必须用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]来寻找敌人。

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[rPaHIh0ICnTLnRO6]{2 狗头人斥候 Kobold Scouts}

狗头人战术 Kobold Tactics

如果狗头人的回合开始时它仍处于躲藏状态，它会用弩对一名英雄开火。该角色在此次攻击中处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]状态，这会使其AC承受-2状态减值，并允许狗头人从其偷袭能力中造成额外伤害。在这次远程打击之后，狗头人不再处于躲藏状态（如果你还没有展示它们的指示物，现在展示），然后战斗照常进行。

经验值 Experience Points

克服本房间中的狗头人后，给予每位英雄80 XP。

臭烘烘的路障 Smelly Barricade

音频提示 Audio Cue

在玩家突破路障之后，你可以考虑开始播放第二层浸水的路口 Floor 2 Soggy Crossroads播放列表。它能为玩家提供流水声，并体现氛围的变化。

这间房间后方有一道临时路障。如果英雄检查路障，要求进行一次@Check[perception|dc:10]检定。若总和为10或更高，他们会注意到路障后的通道飘来一股恶臭——像腐烂的鱼和汗味。若总和为20或更高，他们还会听见远处某处传来微弱的滴水声。

如果英雄们要拆除路障，在你打开通道前，询问他们是要直接扯倒，还是小心拆解——就像在@UUID[.Ccp3c9A1WH9tOCVO]中那样。其他房间的生物离得太远，听不到英雄制造的噪音，但英雄们无从得知这一点！

同样地，就像在区域04中一样，我们也提供了另一个宏，可用于自动拆除路障。要运行它，只需点击@Macro[pb7k8V9m7cFioy6B]。



原文:

Floor Two

The challenges in the second level of the dungeon are more dangerous than those in the first level. In their explorations of this level, the players will learn the truth behind the missing fish. A band of kobolds under the city has recently hatched a horned dragon wyrmling, and have been raiding the Otari Fishery to provide a steady diet for their growing charge. If the heroes don’t defeat this menace, the dragon might grow up to spell doom for the town of Otari!

The players will have to use all their skills and abilities if they hope to defeat the kobolds—and the dragon. As with the first level, unless noted otherwise, the chambers in this level aren’t lit. The kobolds all have darkvision and have little need for light.

If you haven't already done so, activate the second level of the map to bring your players' focus to it, and place down their heroes' tokens on the staircase in this area.

The kobolds prepared this room to defend against any intruders and stationed two of their more capable guards to defend this place. Because they're hiding, don't reveal their tokens just yet. When the heroes descend the spiral staircase, read the following aloud.

The stairs spiral down deep into the earth before ending in a chamber that looks like it’s been prepared specifically to defend against intruders. On one side of the room, a table has been turned on its side to provide cover, while on the other, crates and barrels have been piled up to create a second barrier.

Hidden Kobolds

The kobold scouts begin this encounter hidden. Ask each player to tell you their Perception DC: their Perception + 10. Then roll a d20 and add the kobolds' Stealth. If the total is equal to or higher than the highest Perception DC from the heroes, the heroes don't notice the kobolds before they attack- the room looks like it's empty! Don't reveal the tokens on the map until the kobolds attack or they move out from behind their barricades, or until a hero moves around the barricades enough to see a hiding kobold. But if any hero's Perception DC is higher than the total of the kobold's Stealth check, the kobolds are spotted! Reveal their tokens on the map.

Either way, ask the players to roll initiative (using Perception unless a hero was hiding). Use the total from the kobolds' Stealth check for their initiative. If any heroes have their turn before the kobolds but the kobolds successfully hid themselves, the heroes know there are foes nearby, but they don't know where- they'll have to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} to find their enemies.

Encounter

@Actor[rPaHIh0ICnTLnRO6]{2 Kobold Scouts}

Kobold Tactics

If a kobold's turn starts while they're hidden, they fire their crossbow at a hero. That character has the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{off-guard} condition against the attack, which gives them a -2 status penalty to AC and allows the kobold to deal extra damage from their sneak attack ability. After this ranged Strike, the kobold is no longer hidden (reveal their tokens if you haven't already), and the fight proceeds normally.

Experience Points

For overcoming the kobolds in this room, award each hero 80 XP.

Smelly Barricade

Audio Cue

After your players breach the barricade, you may wish to start the Floor 2 Soggy Crossroads playlist. This will provide your players with the sounds of running water and denote a change in atmosphere.

There is a makeshift barricade in the back of this room. If the heroes examine this barricade, ask for a @Check[type:perception|dc:10]{Perception Check}. If the total is 10 or higher, they notice a foul stench coming from the passage behind the barricade—like rotten fish and sweat. If the total is 20 or higher, they also hear a faint sound of dripping water coming from somewhere in the distance.

If the heroes take this barricade apart, ask them if they tear it down or carefully disassemble it before you open the pathway-just like in @UUID[.Ccp3c9A1WH9tOCVO]{Area 04}. The creatures in the other rooms are too far away to hear any noise the heroes make, but the heroes have no way of knowing that!

Again, just like in Area 04, we've provided another macro you can use to automatically dismantle the barricade. To run it, just click @Macro[pb7k8V9m7cFioy6B]{Area 12 - Barricade}.

Soggy Crossroads.name: 浸水的路口 Soggy Crossroads
Soggy Crossroads.text:
在这个交叉路口，英雄们可以选择自己想要先走哪边。

越过路障，通道蜿蜒了一小段。地面略微下倾，不久便被一汪浅水淹没。水似乎正从右侧的一条通道流出，而那个方向有一道闪烁的蓝光在水面上反射。主通道则继续向左延伸，越过地面上积水形成的浅洼。一股难以抵挡的恶臭从拐弯处飘来。

来自@UUID[.7Ko4GJeI1K3Vy1Xp]的光闪烁又消退，仿佛是水面上的倒影。如果玩家停下来研究一会儿，他们会注意到倒影中有微弱的火光闪现，但似乎在更远的地方。英雄们在这里停下仔细聆听的话，也会注意到主通道更深处——@UUID[.CMjhAWaRWlbFVoF0]——传来微弱的低吼声。



原文:

This intersection offers the heroes a choice of which way they’d like to go first.

Beyond the barricade, the passageway meanders briefly. The floor descends slightly and soon becomes flooded by a shallow pool of water. The water appears to be flowing out of a passageway to the right, and a shimmering blue light in that direction reflects off of the water there. The main passageway continues to the left, over the slight depression in the floor where the water has pooled. An overpowering stench drifts from around a bend.

The light coming from @UUID[.7Ko4GJeI1K3Vy1Xp]{Area 14} shimmers and fades, as if it were a reflection off the water. If the players stop to study it for a while, they notice faint glimmers of firelight in the reflections, but these seem further away. Heroes who stop to listen here also note a faint growling noise coming from further up the main passageway- @UUID[.CMjhAWaRWlbFVoF0]{Area 15}.

Elements of Chaos.name: 混乱的元素 Elements of Chaos
Elements of Chaos.text:
当英雄们进入房间时，大声朗读以下内容。

在水坑的另一边有一个奇怪的房间，噼啪作响的魔法能量在其中跳动。脉动的光球漂浮在房间四个角落中的三个角上。西南角的光球由褐色泥土与石块构成；东北角的光球看起来像玻璃制成，内部充满翻涌旋转的云雾；而远处角落的光球则盛着咆哮的烈焰。与那火焰光球相对的一角，只剩破碎残骸，水从那里沿通道向西北流去。

虽然英雄们可能想要了解更多关于这个房间的信息，但他们必须先处理被困在这里的生物：当英雄们进入时，一个由纯粹火焰构成的元素体会立刻从火焰光球中现身。

音频提示 Audio Cue

一旦遭遇开始，音板循环 Soundboard Loops曲目《Everything is Fire》很适合用来提醒玩家：靠近煤渣鼠 Cinder Rat有多危险。

这个房间的魔法召唤了一个看起来像老鼠的小型元素生物，它完全由燃烧的煤炭与阴燃的火焰构成。它无法进入水中，因此被困在这里，大部分时间都躲在火焰光球里。只要第一个角色穿过水进入此室，火焰光球就会碎裂，煤渣鼠随即发动攻击。

要开始遭遇，你可以使用@Macro[iPvtf4ZGr6qX8OnF]。它会把地图上的光球替换为破碎版本、播放一个音效，并揭示煤渣鼠的指示物。你要做的只剩掷先攻！

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[hiGwRWdxAsoCII4f]

烟雾与隐蔽生物 Smoke and Concealed Creatures

煤渣鼠会在自身周围散发烟雾，如其「恶臭烟瘴」能力所述。这使它获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}状态，令其更难被攻击命中。每当英雄尝试进行法术攻击检定或以打击（Strike）攻击老鼠时，先让玩家进行一次纯骰检定——投掷d20且不加任何调整值。若结果为5或更高，英雄照常进行攻击；若为4或更低，则该次攻击失手。

烟雾也会令邻近生物窒息，迫使它们进行强韧豁免以避免呛咳。

持续伤害 Persistent Damage

每当煤渣鼠命中英雄，那名英雄就会着火！这会造成持续伤害——一种不会立刻结算的特殊伤害。改为该英雄在其回合结束时（不是煤渣鼠的回合结束时）受到[[/r 1d4[persistent,fire]]]。随后该英雄可以进行一次纯骰检定（投掷d20且不加任何调整值）以尝试熄灭火焰——若结果为15或更高，则火焰熄灭！若未达成，则其会在下一个回合结束时再次受到该伤害（每次结算该伤害都重新掷1d4），然后再进行一次新的纯骰检定。上述流程会在每个回合结束时重复，直到火焰熄灭。

英雄也可以用其他动作灭火。英雄可以花费1个动作拍灭火焰；若如此做，他们可立刻进行一次纯骰检定，在结算持续伤害前尝试熄灭火焰，如上所述。英雄也可能想到跳进水坑：若其俯卧于充满水的方格中（获得 prone状态），火焰会自动熄灭。

经验值 Experience Points

若英雄们遭遇并击败煤渣鼠，给予每位英雄80 XP。

元素之助 Elemental Aid

与煤渣鼠战斗结束后，英雄们可以调查另外两个光球。两者都完好无损，且看起来相对稳定。若有人在此室施展侦测魔法，他们会感知到魔法的存在。

空气光球内充满翻涌的云雾。若有人触碰它，一阵疾风将席卷全室，夹带着如耳语般的声音：“呼唤风来获得我的祝福，翱翔天际。”这会赋予英雄们一种特殊能力：每名英雄可在接下来24小时内使用1次。花费1个动作呼唤风之力后，该英雄可在其下一个动作中飞行，移动至多40尺。其必须在坚实地面上结束移动——否则会坠落，并受到等同于坠落距离一半的钝击伤害。

若英雄们接触大地光球，他们会听见碾磨与低沉轰鸣，仿佛巨石沿山坡滚落。在这片喧响中，他们听见另一个声音说：“呼唤大地，获得它的力量。”英雄们获得第二种能力：每名英雄可在接下来24小时内使用1次。若英雄花费1个动作呼唤大地，则其所有近战打击在伤害上获得额外2点伤害，源于骤然涌现的力量。此加值持续至该英雄下一回合开始。

光球的魔法效果只会发生一次。若玩家之后再回到这里，光球将保持沉默，不再提供任何好处。

追踪效果 Tracking Effects

@Item[5GOQjPjCvdRjdLIu] @Item[QhskhZjYTuD5IDfs]

为帮助你和玩家记住这些元素祝福的持续时间与效果，你可以将这些效果从此处拖曳到他们的角色卡或其指示物上。



原文:

When the heroes enter the room, read the following aloud.

On the far side of the puddle of water is a strange chamber, crackling with magical energy. Pulsing orbs float in three of the four corners of this room. The orb in the southwest is made of brown earth and stone, whereas the one in the northeast looks to be made of glass, and is filled with a swirling cloud. The orb in the far corner holds a roaring flame; opposite that orb are shattered remains and the water that flows down the passageway to the northwest.

While the heroes might want to learn more about this room, they must first deal with the creature trapped here: an elemental made of pure fire that emerges from the fire orb as soon as the heroes enter.

Audio Cue

Once the encounter has started, the Soundboard Loops track "Everything is Fire" should be useful in indicating to your players the danger of being close to the Cinder Rat.

The magic in this room summoned a small elemental creature that looks just like a rat, made up entirely of burning coal and smoldering flame. It can't go into the water, so it's trapped here and spends most of its time hiding within the fire orb. As soon as the first character passes through the water into this room, the fiery orb shatters and the cinder rat attacks. 

To start the encounter, you can use the @Macro[iPvtf4ZGr6qX8OnF]{Area 14- Cinder Rat} macro. It will replace the orb on the map with a broken one, and play a sound effect, while also revealing the cinder rat's token. All you need to do is roll for initiative!

Encounter

@Actor[hiGwRWdxAsoCII4f]{Cinder Rat}

Smoke and Concealed Creatures

The cinder rat emits a cloud of smoke around itself, as described in the Fetid Fumes ability. This gives it the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, making it hard to hit with attacks. Whenever a hero attempts a spell attack roll or Strikes the rat, first ask the player to roll a flat check—a d20 roll with nothing added. If the die comes up with a 5 or higher, the hero can attack normally. If the roll is a 4 or less, the attack misses.

The smoke also chokes nearby creatures, forcing them to make fortitude saves to avoid choking.

Persistent Damage

Whenever the cinder rat hits a hero, that hero catches on fire! This deals persistent damage, a special type of damage that doesn’t happen right away. Instead, that hero takes [[/r 1d4[persistent,fire]]]{1d4 persistent fire damage} at the end of their turn (not the rat’s turn). The hero can then attempt a flat check (roll a d20 without adding anything) to see if the fire goes out—if the result is a 15 or higher, the flames are extinguished! If not, they’ll take the damage again at the end of their next turn (rolling 1d4 each time they take this damage), and then roll a new flat check. This happens at the end of every turn until the fire goes out.

There are other actions a hero can use to put out the fire. A hero can spend an action to pat out the flames. If they do, they can roll a flat check right away, before they take the damage, as described above. A hero might also think to go jump in the puddle of water. If they drop to the ground in a square filled with water (gaining the prone condition), the flames go out automatically.

Experience Points

If the heroes encounter and defeat the cinder rat, award each hero 80 XP.

Elemental Aid

After the fight with the rat, the heroes can investigate the other two orbs. Both are intact and appear to be relatively stable. If anyone casts detect magic in this chamber, they sense the presence of magic.

The air orb is filled with a swirling cloud. If anyone touches it, a rush of wind fills the room, carrying a voice like a whisper. It says, “Call upon the wind to gain my blessing and soar through the sky.” This gives the heroes a special ability they can each use once within the next 24 hours. By spending 1 action to call upon the wind, that hero can fly for their next action, moving up to 40 feet. They have to end the movement on solid ground—if they don’t, they fall and take bludgeoning damage equal to half the distance they fell.

If the heroes touch the earth orb, they hear grinding and grumbling, like boulders falling down a hill. In this cacophony, they hear another voice that says, "Call upon the earth to gain its strength." The heroes gain a second ability they can each use once within the next 24 hours. If a hero spends an action to call upon the earth, all their melee Strikes deal 2 extra damage from a sudden surge of strength. This bonus lasts until the start of the hero's next turn.

The orb's magical effects happen only once. If the players come back here again, the orbs are silent and don't offer any benefits.

Tracking Effects

@Item[5GOQjPjCvdRjdLIu]{Blessing of the Earth} @Item[QhskhZjYTuD5IDfs]{Blessing of the Air}

To help you and your players remember the duration and nature of these elemental blessings, you can apply these effects to their characters by dragging them from here to their character sheet or onto their token.

Mermaid Fountain.name: 美人鱼喷泉 Mermaid Fountain
Mermaid Fountain.text:
这个房间里有一个阴险的陷阱。当英雄们进入该区域时，大声朗读以下内容。

虽然这个长方形房间的大部分都已成废墟，但中央有一座盛满清澈泉水的喷泉完好无损，底部有什么东西在闪闪发光。喷泉中央是一尊大理石美人鱼雕像，她噘着嘴，仿佛正要送出一个飞吻——又或许是在吹口哨。水池的每个角落都嵌着某种机关，但西南角的那一处似乎已经被砸毁。

房间中央的美人鱼雕像是这个阴险陷阱的核心。当英雄进入房间时，要求每个玩家进行一次@Check[perception|dc:20]检定。记下这些结果，因为你也将用它们来决定英雄们的先攻。

如果有人总结果为20或更高，他们会在触发陷阱前注意到陷阱的存在。否则，英雄们不会注意到任何异常。他们可以正常行动——但只要有人踏上与水池相邻的任意一块地砖，陷阱就会触发！

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[v51J7K27abdDyLgJ]

这是一个复杂陷阱，意味着它像怪物一样运作。如果英雄触发了陷阱，使用先前的察觉检定结果来决定他们的先攻。你可以通过启用战斗追踪器，并点击聊天中该次掷骰旁的交叉长剑图标来完成。喷泉以隐匿进行先攻。

在它的回合，喷泉中央的雕像会旋转，从口中射出一股高压水流。每一轮的具体效果都不同，并会以房间内的随机区域为目标。陷阱的“流程（Routine）”条目说明其运作方式。

克服陷阱 Overcoming the Trap

英雄可以用多种方式克服此陷阱。如果有人在陷阱启动前发现了它，并且所有人都避开喷泉相邻的方格，他们就能安全地绕过陷阱。

一旦陷阱启动，英雄可以尝试解除位于水池四角的控制机关。只要其中任意一块石制机关仍在运作，陷阱就会在其回合继续行动；不过对英雄来说幸运的是，西南角的机关已经被摧毁（因此只需要停用另外三个角的机关）。要停用一个机关，英雄必须站在与其相邻的方格，并花费2个动作，尝试一次@Check[thievery|dc:20]检定。成功则该机关被停用。

英雄也可以通过分别攻击来物理摧毁剩余的三个机关（使用陷阱数据表中的AC与生命值）。喷泉由石头制成，具有硬度。每当英雄命中一个机关时，在减少该机关生命值之前，先从伤害骰结果中减去该数值。

当不再有任何可运作的机关时——无论它们是被停用还是被摧毁——陷阱都会停止运作，英雄们便可继续探索。

经验值 Experience Points

如果英雄们绕过、停用或摧毁喷泉，则奖励每名英雄80 XP。

宝藏 Treasure

@Actor[xhyzSiXfoAxud376]

一旦陷阱被停用，英雄就能轻松爬进喷泉取走硬币。水深只有1尺，虽然非常冷，但并不危险。喷泉内有28 cp、8 sp与2 gp。

玩家找到一批杂乱的硬币储藏时，往往会想把它们平均分配。你可以使用战利品表上的“分发钱币”按钮，将货币分给英雄们，而无需自己计算！



原文:

This chamber contains a devious trap. When the heroes enter this area, read the following aloud.

While much of this rectangular chamber is in ruins, the center contains a fountain of pristine water with something glittering at the bottom. In the middle of the fountain is a marble statue of a mermaid, her lips pursed as if she were about to blow a kiss, or maybe whistle. Each corner of the pool has some sort of mechanism embedded in the stones, but the one in the southwest corner appears to be smashed.

The mermaid statue in the center of the room is the center of a devious trap. When the heroes enter the room, ask each player to roll a @Check[type:perception|dc:20]{Perception Check}. Take note of these results, because you'll also use them to determine the heroes' initiative.

If anyone's total is 20 or higher, they notice the trap before setting it off. If not, the heroes don't notice anything unusual. They can act normally- but if anyone steps on any of the tiles adjacent to the pool, the trap goes off!

Encounter

@Actor[v51J7K27abdDyLgJ]{Mermaid Fountain}

This trap is complex, which means it works like a monster. If the heroes trigger the trap, use the Perception results from before to determine their initiative. You can do this by activating the combat tracker and clicking on the crossed swords icon beside the roll in chat. The fountain rolls Stealth for its initiative.

On its turn, the statue in the middle of the fountain spins around, shooting a stream of high-pressure water from its mouth. The exact effects are different each round and target random parts of the room. The trap's Routine entry describes how this works.

Overcoming the Trap

The heroes can overcome this trap in a variety of ways. If someone notices it before it goes off and everyone avoids the squares adjacent to the fountain, they can safely bypass the trap.

Once the trap goes off, the heroes can try to disable the control mechanisms located at each corner of the pool. If any of these stones are still active, the trap continues to act on its turn, but fortunately for the heroes, the mechanism in the southwest corner has already been destroyed (leaving only those in the other three corners to deactivate). To deactivate a mechanism, a hero must stand in an adjacent square and spend 2 actions to attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:20]{Thievery Skill Check}. On a success, that mechanism is disabled.

The heroes can also physically destroy the three remaining mechanisms by attacking them individually (using the AC and Hit Points in the trap's stat block). The fountain, being made of stone, has Hardness. Each time a hero hits a mechanism, subtract this number from the damage roll before reducing the mechanism’s Hit Points.

Once there are no functioning mechanisms left, whether the heroes have disabled or destroyed them, the trap stops working, and the heroes can continue their exploration.

Experience Points

If they heroes bypass the fountain, disable it, or destroy it, award each hero 80 XP.

Treasure

@Actor[xhyzSiXfoAxud376]{Mermaid Fountain}

Once the trap is deactivated, a hero can easily climb into the fountain and get the coins. The water is only 1 foot deep, and while it's very cold, it's not dangerous. Inside the fountain are 28 cp, 8 sp, and 2 gp.

Often, when players find a stash of assorted coins, they'll want to split them equally. You can use the "distribute coins" button on the loot sheet to share the currency between your heroes without needing to do any calculations yourself!

Xulgath Cave.name: 地蜥人洞穴 Xulgath Cave
Xulgath Cave.text:
这个房间是三个地蜥人的巢穴，他们是臭烘烘的爬行类人生物。你可以将地蜥人（特征）指示物随意放在洞窟中央附近。大声朗读下面的内容。

这个房间里有一种令人难以抗拒的恶臭，就像腐烂的鱼混合着油腻的汗味。温暖潮湿的空气让这股臭味更显浓烈。与之前的房间不同，这里似乎是一处天然洞穴，点缀着石灰岩钟乳石与石笋，让人很难看清房间究竟延伸到哪里才结束。

这个房间里可怕的恶臭来自于地蜥人，会让其他生物感到不适。让每位玩家在进入房间后立刻进行一次@Check[fortitude|dc:19]{Fortitude 豁免}。任何成功者都可以无视这种气味。未能通过该豁免的英雄会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}：其所有d20掷骰结果与DC（包括其AC）承受–1状态减值，直到其花费一个动作干呕。

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[RTzFvmdSCf5yhguy]{3 地蜥人战士 Xulgath Warriors}

房间中央的爬行类生物是地蜥人：一种生活在地下的爬行类人形生物，通常以称为“育群”的大型家族群体聚居，并为领土与资源与他者争斗。它们以其好斗的天性和可怕的恶臭闻名——而它们自身对这股臭味免疫。

惊讶的地蜥人 Surprised Xulgaths

这三个地蜥人正为一块肉彼此争吵，还没注意到英雄。让玩家进行先攻掷骰，同时你为地蜥人以察觉进行它们的先攻掷骰。

地蜥人战术 Xulgath Tactics

战斗开始时，地蜥人是坐着的，且武器未出鞘。在它们花费一个动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stand}之前，它们处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{off-guard}（其AC承受–2环境减值）。它们还必须再花费一个动作抽出木棒后才能进行攻击。一旦站起并抽出木棒，地蜥人就会向前移动，并用剩余的动作进行攻击。地蜥人会战斗至死。

经验值 Experience Points

如果英雄击败了本房间的地蜥人，奖励每位英雄120 XP。

宝藏 Treasure

@UUID[Actor.AkfRXhJ81gNlWhhR]{小袋子 Small Bag}

战斗结束后，英雄们可以检定地蜥人是否携带宝藏。若如此，他们会在其中一只恶臭生物的腰间发现一个小袋子。皮革袋内是一把奇怪的钱币，似乎铸造自某个遥远的地下深处王国——钱币的一面刻着洞窟中的高塔，另一面则是一颗阴森的人形蛇首。这些钱币合计价值38 sp与4 gp。

为了让玩家搜刮它们，只要将房间内放在地蜥人旁的“小袋子 Small Bag”战利品指示物设为可见即可。

通往黑暗的通道 Passage into Darkness

除了英雄进来的路之外，还有两条通道通向房间外。一条通道离开地图范围，持续向下，深入地底。这条隧道通往幽暗地域——一个位于地下深处、广阔的地底世界，充满各种致命生物与阴险怪物。地蜥人正是从那里来的，但这超出了本次冒险的范围。

若英雄沿此路旅行，告诉他们：在旅行约一小时后，仍看不到闯入渔场的生物踪迹，他们或许应在彻底迷失方向之前回合返回。幽暗地域是更有经验的冒险者才适合深入的地方，玩家应先更多探索地表，再涉入这些无光的国度。

新挖的隧道 Freshly Dug Tunnel

另一条离开此房间的通道看起来是最近才挖掘的。这条隧道向上弯曲盘绕，最终止于一堵由松散石块与泥土堆成的薄墙。墙上有一个小洞，允许生物窥视另一侧的@UUID[.0vJpmu4QJ7RgYLi2]{区域 17}。若有英雄从洞中窥视，他能看见该区域内的狗头人正进行日常活动。若他们花时代倾听狗头人的闲聊，英雄会偷听到几句片段，包括“当我们偷走蛋的时候”和“给宠物更多的鱼”。想要砸开这堵墙的英雄可以尝试一次@Check[type:athletics|dc:20]{Athletics 技能 检定}。在成功时，他们打碎墙壁！如同之前一样，你可以点击它来运行@Macro[NAxPG4cHu4dKrx6h]{区域 15 - Freshly Dug Tunnel}宏。

在失败时，墙壁仍保持完好，而狗头人宿舍 Kobold Warren中的狗头人会注意到响动并准备战斗。



原文:

This chamber is the den of a trio of xulgaths, which are smelly reptilian humanoids. Place the xulgath tokens as you'd like near the center of the cavern. Read the following aloud.

There is an overpowering stench in this chamber, like rotten fish mixed with oily sweat. The warm, humid air only adds to the foul atmosphere. Unlike the previous chambers, this one appears to be a natural cavern, dotted with limestone stalactites and stalagmites, making it hard to see where the room ends.

The horrid stench in this room comes from the xulgaths and can make other creatures sick. Have each player roll a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]{Fortitude save} as soon as they enter the room. Anyone who succeeds can ignore the smell. A hero who fails this saving throw is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}- they take a –1 status penalty to all their d20 rolls and DCs (including their Armor Class) until they spend an action to retch.

Encounter

@Actor[RTzFvmdSCf5yhguy]{3 Xulgath Warriors}

The reptilian creatures in the center of the room are xulgaths, reptilian humanoids who dwell underground in large family groups called clutches, fighting others for territory and resources. They’re known for their aggressive nature and their horrid stench—which they’re immune to.

Surprised Xulgaths

These three xulgaths are bickering with each other over a piece of meat and haven’t noticed the heroes. Ask the players to roll for initiative while you roll Perception for the xulgaths’ initiative.

Xulgath Tactics

The xulgaths start off combat seated without their weapons drawn. Until they spend an action to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stand}, they’re @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{off-guard} (taking a –2 circumstance penalty to their Armor Class). They also have to spend an action to draw their clubs before they can attack. Once they’ve stood and drawn their clubs, the xulgaths move forward to attack with whatever actions they have left. The xulgaths fight until slain.

Experience Points

If the heroes defeat the xulgaths in this room, award each hero 120 XP.

Treasure

@UUID[Actor.AkfRXhJ81gNlWhhR]{Small Bag}

After the fight, the heroes can check whether the xulgaths have any treasure. If they do, they find a small bag tied to the waist of one of the foul creatures. Inside the leather pouch is a handful of strange coins, minted in some faraway kingdom deep underground- the coins show a tower inside a cave on one side and a sinister-looking humanoid snake's head on the other. These coins amount to 38 sp and 4 gp.

To allow your players to loot them, simply reveal the "small bag" loot token which is placed next to the Xulgaths in the room.

Passage into Darkness

Two passages lead out of this room, other than the way the heroes came in. One leads off the map, heading steadily down, deep into the earth. This tunnel leads into the Darklands, a vast subterranean realm deep underground filled with all sorts of deadly creatures and sinister monsters. This is where the xulgaths came from, but it’s beyond the scope of this adventure.

If the heroes travel down this way, tell them that after an hour of travel, they see no sign of the creatures that broke into the fishery and should probably turn back before getting hopelessly lost. The Darklands are for more experienced adventurers, and the players should explore the surface more before delving into these lightless realms.

Freshly Dug Tunnel

The other passageway exiting this room looks like it was dug recently. This tunnel curves up and around before ending in a thin wall of loose stones and dirt. A tiny hole in the wall allows creatures to look into @UUID[.0vJpmu4QJ7RgYLi2]{Area 17} beyond. If a hero peeks through the wall, they can see the kobolds in that area going about their daily routines. If they spend time listening to the kobolds’ chatter, the heroes overhear a few phrases, including “when we stole the egg” and “more fish for the pet.” A hero who wants to break open this wall can attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:20]{Athletics skill check}. On a success, they break down the wall! As before, you can run the @Macro[NAxPG4cHu4dKrx6h]{Area 15 - Freshly Dug Tunnel} macro by clicking on it.

On a failure, the wall remains intact, and the kobolds in the Kobold Warren notice the sound and prepare for a fight.

Kobold Warren.name: 狗头人宿舍 Kobold Warren
Kobold Warren.text:
这个房间里住着此地大多数的狗头人团伙。当英雄们进入房间时，大声朗读以下内容。

门一打开，腐鱼与霉味便扑面而来。在这间宽阔房间的西侧有一张大桌子，两侧各有长凳。残余的食物碎屑、肮脏的刀子与破碎的盘子堆得满桌都是。东侧墙边则挖出了许多洞穴，形成铺着草席的小睡眠间。这一定就是狗头人的巢穴！

狗头人的位置 Kobold Placement

奥塔里地下的狗头人已将这间房间据为家园。这里有6只狗头人，但它们的确切位置取决于英雄在其他区域的动作。如果英雄们在打穿这片区域与@UUID[.CMjhAWaRWlbFVoF0]{地蜥人巢穴}之间的墙壁时闹出很大动静，或在@UUID[.MSU45JsvJjOJc1dg]{区域16}中破坏美人鱼喷泉陷阱的机关，就将6只狗头人全部放在房间中央，准备攻击。若英雄们行动安静，则在他们进入时狗头人正放松休息：将其中3只放在桌边，另外3只放在睡眠壁龛中。

无论狗头人位于何处，它们都不欢迎访客。它们立刻发起攻击！让每位玩家掷先攻，并为狗头人掷一次察觉以决定它们何时获得回合。

狗头人不会只专注于某一名角色。两只一组的狗头人可能会设法夹击某位英雄以使用偷袭攻击，而其他狗头人则会使用下述非常规战术。

在与英雄们交战时，狗头人会吹嘘自己强大的血统与合力，向这些“软皮肤”英雄保证他们必定会后悔闯入狗头人的领域。然而，它们依旧和英雄先前在洞窟里击败的那些狗头人一样胆小怯懦。

与英雄们迄今为止遭遇的所有敌人不同，最后剩下的一只狗头人会尝试投降。

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]{6 狗头人战士 Kobold Warriors}

非常规战术 Unconventional Tactics

这些狗头人会在战斗中使用战术，例如在任何可能的情况下尝试夹击英雄。由于这里是它们的家，它们还有一些其他花招可用来对付英雄。在战斗中穿插使用这些招数以增加变化，让玩家保持警惕！

  • 床垫掩蔽 Bed Cover：位于某个睡眠间内的狗头人可以花费1个动作从地上扯起一张睡垫并躲在其后。如此一来，该狗头人获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{效果：掩蔽}，直到它移动或直到其下一回合开始。
  • 食物大战 Food Fight：与桌子相邻的狗头人可以花费1个动作捡起一块腐烂肉渣，向20尺内的一名英雄投掷。这是一次+5攻击调整值的远程打击。若打击命中，不造成伤害；改为令该英雄陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心}，直到其花费1个动作把恶心的食物从身上清理掉（无需检定）。

  • 油攻 Oil Attack：两个睡眠壁龛之间的箱子里（除其他杂物外）装有3罐滑油。狗头人必须先花费1个动作打开箱子，才能使用其中的油。箱子打开后，与箱子相邻的狗头人可花费1个动作拾起并投掷其中1罐油。这是一次+5攻击调整值的远程打击。若命中英雄，该英雄及其所在方格会被滑油覆盖；若失手，油会覆盖地面但不会沾到英雄身上。狗头人也可以把油投向一个空方格，使该方格变得滑腻。
    在战斗的剩余时间里，沾满油的英雄移动困难。每当该英雄行走时，必须尝试一次@Check[acrobatics|dc:10]。若失败，其改为摔倒并获得倒地状态，而不是移动。英雄可以选择快步（仅移动5尺）以免进行此检定。
    任何穿过被油覆盖方格的生物都必须尝试一次@Check[acrobatics|dc:10]。若失败，其停止移动并摔倒。

经验值 Experience Points

因战胜本房间内的狗头人，给予每位英雄120 XP。注意：英雄还可能因他们如何处理最后剩下的狗头人而获得额外XP。

狗头人投降 Kobold Surrender

当只剩下一只狗头人时，他立刻丢下武器向英雄们投降，用沙哑尖细的嗓音乞求饶命、卑躬屈膝。若英雄饶他一命，这个生物承诺会离开并永不返回，但他也会悄声补充：愿意用秘密换取金币。

若英雄想知道狗头人所知的情报，有两种选择。第一种是支付他索要的金币：若给他10 gp，他会分享有关老大的情报；若给他20 gp（总额，不是额外再加），他还会分享有关龙的情报。

但舍弃辛苦得来的财富并非唯一办法。英雄可以尝试进行一次@Check[diplomacy|dc:10]检定说服狗头人吐露情报，或用一次@Check[intimidation|dc:10]检定恐吓他开口。若英雄的总结果为10或更高，他们得知老大的情报；若总结果为20或更高，他们也会得知有关龙的情报。

关于老大 About the Boss：狗头人会如此描述他们巢穴的首领。

“佐尔格兰老大是强大狗头人的大头领，她有厉害的魔法能把你们活活烤熟！她一直都很生气，对仆从要求很多。尤其是现在我们有了一个强大的新朋友！”

关于龙 About the Dragon：狗头人会如此描述那条龙。

“那朋友是一条龙，是众神的赐福，预示狗头人注定要回到地表，征服那可悲的人类小镇。等雏龙长大，我们就会起事，夺回本该属于我们的东西！”

经验值 Experience Points

若英雄让投降的狗头人说出有关老大的情报，给予每位英雄额外10 XP。若他们让他也说出有关龙的情报，则将此奖励提高为30 XP。

宝藏 Treasure

@Actor[1S486XWdfcEWYv6T]

战斗结束后，英雄们可以检查巢穴的其余部分。这里每只狗头人都戴着铜片与蛋壳串成的项链，就像在@UUID[.2KRdW68qNXeJ6JpN]{狗头人岗哨 Kobold Lookouts}里发现的那种一样。

除狗头人的装备外，这里还有一个装满小饰物与搜刮来的贵重物品的箱子。里面有：一匹上等丝绸布料（价值5 gp）、一幅骑马冒险者的画（价值2 gp）、一袋装有20 sp的钱袋、一个装满陈旧酸葡萄酒的水晶醒酒器（醒酒器价值1 gp）、3罐油（扣除战斗中狗头人投掷的数量）、一件奇妙小玩意：微型梯子，以及一瓶治疗药水。



原文:

This chamber houses the majority of the kobold band dwelling here. When the heroes enter the room, read the following aloud.

As the door opens, the smell of rotten fish and mold wafts out. On the west side of this vast room is a large table with benches on either side. Old food scraps, dirty knives, and broken plates cover the table. Off to the east side, burrows have been dug into the wall to make small sleeping chambers filled with straw mats. This must be the kobolds' warren!

Kobold Placement

The kobolds beneath Otari have claimed this chamber as their home. Six of them are here, but their exact location depends on the heroes’ actions in other areas. If the heroes made lots of noise breaking through the wall between this area and the @UUID[.CMjhAWaRWlbFVoF0]{Xulgath den} or by destroying the mechanisms for the mermaid fountain trap in @UUID[.MSU45JsvJjOJc1dg]{Area 16}, place all six of the kobolds in the center of the room, ready to attack. If the heroes were quiet, the kobolds are relaxing when the heroes enter. Place three of them at the table, and put the other three in the sleeping alcoves.

Wherever the kobolds are, they're not happy about having visitors. They spring to attack! Ask each player to roll initiative, and roll Perception once to determine when the kobolds get their turn.

The kobolds don’t focus on any one character. Pairs of kobolds might try to flank one hero to use their sneak attack, while others use the unconventional tactics described below.

While fighting the heroes, the kobolds boast of their mighty lineage and combined power, assuring the “soft-skin” heroes that they’ll surely come to regret trespassing into the kobolds’ domain. However, they remain just as cowardly as the kobolds the heroes have already defeated in these caverns.

Unlike all the foes the heroes have faced so far, the last remaining kobold tries to surrender.

Encounter

@Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]{6 Kobold Warriors}

Unconventional Tactics

These kobolds use tactics in their fight, such as attempting to flank the heroes whenever possible. Since this is their home, they have a few other tricks they can use against the heroes. Use these throughout the fight to add variety and keep the players on their toes!

  • Bed Cover: A kobold in one of the sleeping chambers can spend 1 action to pull a sleeping mat off the floor and hide behind it. Doing so grants the kobold @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Effect: Cover} until they move or the start of their next turn.
  • Food Fight: A kobold adjacent to the table can spend 1 action to pick up a scrap of rotting meat and throw it at a hero within 20 feet. This is a ranged Strike with a +5 attack modifier. If the Strike hits, it doesn’t deal damage. Instead, the hero is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} until they spend an action to clean the gross food off (no check needed).

  • Oil Attack: The chest between two of the sleeping alcoves contains, among other things, three jars of slippery oil. A kobold must spend an action to open the chest before they can use the oil stored inside. Once the chest is open, a kobold next to it can spend 1 action to pick up and throw one of these jars of oil. This is a ranged Strike with a +5 attack modifier. If it hits a hero, that hero and the square they’re in are coated in slippery oil. On a miss, the oil covers the ground but not the hero. The kobold can also throw the oil at an empty square to make just the square slippery.
    For the rest of the fight, a hero covered in oil has trouble moving. Each time they Stride, they must attempt a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:10]{Acrobatics Skill Check}. If they fail, they fall over and gain the prone condition instead of moving. The hero can Step, moving only 5 feet, without this check.
    Anyone who moves through a square covered in oil must attempt a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:10]{Acrobatics Skill Check}. If they fail, they stop moving and fall.

Experience Points

For overcoming the kobolds in this room, award each hero 120 XP. Note that the heroes can earn additional XP depending on how they handle the last remaining kobold.

Kobold Surrender

When only one kobold remains, he immediately drops his weapons and surrenders to the heroes, begging and groveling for his life with a raspy, high-pitched voice. If the heroes spare the kobold, the creature promises to leave and never return, but he also quietly adds that he's willing to share secrets in exchange for gold.

The heroes have two options if they want to learn what the kobold knows. The first is to offer the kobold the gold he requests. If they give the kobold 10 gp, he shares what he knows about the boss, and if they give him 20 gp (total, not in addition), he also shares what he knows about the dragon.

But parting with their hard-earned wealth isn't the only solution. A hero can try to persuade the kobold to share what he knows by rolling a @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:10]{Diplomacy} skill check, or they can bully the kobold with an @Check[type:intimidation|dc:10]{Intimidation} skill check. If a hero's total is 10 or more, they learn about the boss, and if their total is 20 or more, they learn about the dragon, too.

About the Boss: The kobold says the following about their warren's boss.

"Boss Zolgran is the big leader of the mighty kobolds, and she has powerful magics to roast you alive! She's very angry all the time and demands much from her servants. Especially now that we have a powerful new friend!"

About the Dragon: The kobold says the following about the dragon.

"The friend is a dragon and a blessing from the gods, a sign that kobolds are destined to return to the surface and conquer the pathetic human town. As soon as the hatchling is all grown, we'll rise up to take what is ours!"

Experience Points

If the heroes get the surrendered kobold to tell them about the boss, award each hero an additional 10 XP. If they get him to tell them about the dragon, increase this bonus to 30 XP instead.

Treasure

@Actor[1S486XWdfcEWYv6T]{Kobold Loot}

Once the fight ends, the heroes can examine the rest of the warren. Each kobold here is wearing a copper-and-eggshell necklace like those found in @UUID[.2KRdW68qNXeJ6JpN]{Kobold Lookouts}.

In addition to the kobolds' gear, there's a chest filled with trinkets and collected valuables. It holds a bolt of fine silk cloth worth 5 gp, a painting of an adventurer on a horse worth 2 gp, a sack filled with 20 sp, a crystal decanter filled with old, sour wine (the decanter is worth 1 gp), 3 jars of oil (minus any the kobolds threw during the fight), a marvelous miniature ladder, and a healing potion.

Dragonkeeper.name: 守龙者 Dragonkeeper
Dragonkeeper.text:
升级 Level Up

如果英雄们克服了区域17的所有挑战，他们应该已经获得了足够的经验值来获得一个等级！升到第2级能让每位英雄获得他们面对最后两场遭遇——对抗狗头人老大与巨龙——所需的力量提升！你也可以鼓励队伍在此时休息一下。

你可以通过与玩家分享日志条目来帮助他们为英雄升级。打开@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.DXbYBjutIcp4bmB7]日志讲义，并在标题栏点击“展示给玩家”。

一场恶战 A Hard Fight

这对英雄来说可能是一场非常艰苦的战斗，尤其是还未升到2级的队伍。如果英雄们被迫撤退，佐尔甘不会追击他们，但她会命令她的守卫这么做。如果英雄们杀死了这些守卫但仍选择撤退，佐尔甘会在英雄们下次抵达之前招募两名@Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]作为新的护卫。他们不如狗头人斥候强，但仍能协助保卫他们的首领。

 

狗头人老大住在这个房间里，身边有两个狗头人斥候陪同。把老大放在王座上，将两个斥候放在楼梯底部。当英雄们进入房间时，大声朗读以下内容。

在这个巨大的天然洞穴中央，地面上裂开了一个大坑。远处的一侧有一道岩架俯瞰着入口。岩架上放着一张华丽的石王座，出现在这里显得格格不入。一只威严的狗头人戴着一顶由鱼骨制成的超大王冠，坐在王座之上。她朝楼梯脚下的两个狗头人守卫咆哮道：“杀死入侵者！”

过去几年里，这群狗头人日子过得很艰难，但当他们有机会偷到一枚龙蛋时，命运就此改变！这件珍贵的宝藏被秘密运回狗头人藏身处后，首领佐尔甘因为获得了一位巨龙主君而为她的帮派拟定了宏大的计划。她希望养大这条龙，用它征服整个地区，并最终为她的族人夺回奥塔里镇。对奥塔里的居民来说，幸运的是这条雏龙还没完全长大——但新孵化的幼龙总是饥肠辘辘。这就是这群狗头人搬进这些洞穴、以及他们袭击奥塔里渔场的原因。没有稳定的食物供应，年幼的龙可能就会把狗头人当作点心！

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[AleeS0IRqT4tUphB]，@Actor[rPaHIh0ICnTLnRO6]{2 狗头人斥候 Kobold Scouts}

深坑 The Pit

房间中央的坑深20尺。英雄若想跳过此坑，必须花费2个动作并进行一次@Check[athletics|dc:15|showDC:all]检定。若失败，他们会掉入坑中，受到10点伤害。坑中的英雄必须攀爬出去，这要求他们连续成功进行两次@Check[athletics|dc:10|showDC:all]检定。

狗头人战术 Kobold Tactics

这条龙还不够驯服，无法听命于首领，因此狗头人把这只生物关在附近的洞穴里（@UUID[.KMTBj18whqvjGZBz]），安全地隔离在其他族群成员休息区域之外。不幸的是，对英雄而言，首领和她的守卫本身就已经足够危险。

两名狗头人斥候会移动到深坑两侧，阻止英雄接近他们的首领；但他们会追击任何成功绕过他们的英雄。与此同时，佐尔甘会用法术攻击队伍！这只狡猾的狗头人能像法师一样施法。她已准备的法术列在她的数据表中。

在她的第一个回合中，她会花费全部3个动作来施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]。该法术会发射三枚魔法力场碎片，她会将其瞄准距离最近的三名英雄，使每名英雄受到1d4+1点力场伤害。若有人突破她的守卫，她会对那名英雄施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]，希望迫使其逃跑。若她用尽所有1环法术，她会改为施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MPxbKoR54gkYkqLO]。只有在别无选择时，佐尔甘才会用法杖进行攻击。

经验值 Experience Points

如果英雄们击败佐尔甘和她的守卫，奖励每位英雄100 XP。若英雄在完成这场遭遇时仍为1级，则由于额外挑战，每位英雄再获得40 XP的奖励。

佐尔甘的宝藏 Zolgran's Treasure

@Actor[p84EOttaNannSP3y]

王座所在的岩架同样是佐尔甘个人的休息区。这里放着一张稻草铺，就像@UUID[.0vJpmu4QJ7RgYLi2]里那样。检查这张格格不入的王座的英雄可以将其设计与楼上@UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]的装饰风格相互对照——狗头人正是从那里把王座搬来的。最重要的是，这里有一只陈旧、生锈的铁箱。铁箱上放着一片巨大的破蛋壳，几乎有2尺高。蛋壳呈象牙色，带有绿色纹理；显然，首领与此处许多狗头人佩戴的蛋壳碎片都来自这枚蛋。尽管蛋里究竟孵出了什么仍不完全清楚，但蛋壳一侧留有巨大的爪痕，远大于任何狗头人所能造成的痕迹。

箱子之中 Inside the Chest

箱子上了锁，但佐尔甘把钥匙系在腰间。如果英雄们没有找到钥匙，一名拥有盗贼工具包的角色可以尝试一次@Check[thievery|dc:25]检定，成功即可打开锁！如果玩家成功打开箱子，就在地图上向他们展示战利品actor。

箱子里装着一些狗头人在探索这些隧道时发现的较为有趣的宝藏。这些宝藏包括：一只带鱼纹图案、价值5 gp的银手镯；一张非常古老、描绘着某个外形古怪地城的地图；一把冒烟的剑，剑柄上雕刻着矮人面孔；一根治疗术魔杖；2瓶治疗药水；以及一条化装舞会围巾。

冒险结束了吗？ Are we Done?

如果PC们击败了狗头人及其首领，他们可能会返回奥塔里渔场。如果他们决定不再继续探索，冒险很容易就能在此结束。塔米莉会很高兴地为完成工作的英雄支付报酬——尽管她仍会好奇那枚巨大的蛋里究竟是什么。她也对所有的鱼去了哪里感到疑惑，因为狗头人不可能把鱼全吃光；但这些谜团就留待改日再说吧。

音频提示 Audio Cue

如果你的玩家决定继续前进，你可以使用巨龙音板里的音效“Wyrmling Growl Distant”，警告他们：若在尚未做好准备的情况下继续深入，将面临迫在眉睫的危险。

在这种情况下——或者英雄们并未在下一场遭遇中逃跑——狗头人照料的幼龙会存活下来！最终，这条龙会离开洞穴，在乡野间开始狩猎，成为未来数年的祸患。幸运的是，龙的力量增长非常缓慢。英雄们也许会在未来追捕这头野兽！如果他们多获得了几个等级，在战斗中就会更占优势。

不过更有可能的是，玩家会继续探索下一个洞穴——@UUID[.KMTBj18whqvjGZBz]。那场遭遇是整个冒险中最危险的战斗，所以如果英雄们的有限资源（例如法术）已经所剩无几，你可以尽管鼓励他们先休息一下。



原文:

Level Up

If the heroes overcame all of the challenges through Area 17, they should have enough XP to gain a level! Going up to 2nd level gives each hero the boost of power they'll need to face the final two encounters against the kobold boss and the dragon! You might also encourage the party to rest at this point.

You can help the players level up their heroes by sharing the journal entry with them. Open the @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.DXbYBjutIcp4bmB7]{Leveling Up} handout, and click on "Show Players" in the header.

A Hard Fight

This might be a very tough fight for the heroes, especially if they haven't reached level 2 yet. If they're forced to retreat, Zolgran doesn't follow them, but she orders her guards to do so. If the heroes slay these guards but still retreat, Zolgran recruits two @Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]{Kobold Warriors} to serve as her new guards for the next time the heroes arrive. They aren't as powerful as kobold scouts, but they still help defend their boss.

 

The kobolds' boss lives in this chamber, accompanied by two kobold scouts. Place the boss on the throne, and put the two scouts at the bottom of the stairs. When the heroes enter the room, read the following aloud.

A gaping pit opens in the floor in the center of this large, natural chamber. On the far side, a ledge overlooks the entry. Atop this ledge is an ornate stone throne that looks entirely out of place for this room. A regal kobold wearing an oversized crown made of fish bones sits atop the throne. “Kill the intruders!” she snarls at the two kobold guards at the foot of the stairs.

Things have been rough for the band over the past few years, but their fortune changed when they got the chance to steal a dragon’s egg! With the precious treasure spirited away to the kobold hideout, the boss, Zolgran, has devised grand plans for her band now that it has a dragon patron. After raising the dragon, she hopes to use the beast to subjugate the entire region and finally reclaim the town of Otari for her people. Fortunately for the citizens of Otari, the baby dragon isn't fully grown yet—but the new hatchling is always hungry. That's why the band moved into these caverns, and why they've been raiding the Otari Fishery. Without a steady supply of food, the young dragon might turn to having kobolds for a snack!

Encounter

@Actor[AleeS0IRqT4tUphB]{Zolgran, the Kobold Boss}, @Actor[rPaHIh0ICnTLnRO6]{2 Kobold Scouts}

The Pit

This pit in the center of this chamber is 20 feet deep. Heroes attempting to leap across the pit must spend 2 actions and attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:15|showDC:all]{Athletics skill check}. If they fail, they fall down into the pit, taking 10 damage. A hero in the pit has to climb out, which requires them to succeed at two @Check[type:athletics|dc:10|showDC:all]{Athletics skill check} in a row.

Kobold Tactics

The dragon isn't yet tame enough to do the boss's bidding, so the kobolds have kept the creature in a nearby cave (@UUID[.KMTBj18whqvjGZBz]{Area 19}), safely tucked away from rest of the band. Unfortunately for the heroes, the boss and her guards are more than dangerous enough on their own.

The two kobold scouts move to either side of the pit to block the heroes from getting to their boss, but they chase any hero who manages to get past them. Meanwhile, Zolgran assaults the groups using spells! The crafty kobold can cast spells just like a wizard. The spells she has prepared are listed in her stat block.

On her first turn, she spends all 3 actions to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{force barrage}. This spell fires three shards of magical force, which she aims at the closest three heroes to deal 1d4+1 force damage each. If anyone gets past her guards, she casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{command} on that hero, hoping to make them run away. If she runs out of 1st-rank spells to cast, she casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MPxbKoR54gkYkqLO]{gouging claw}. Zolgran attacks with her staff only if she runs out of other options.

Experience Points

If the heroes defeat Zolgran and her guards, award each hero 100 XP. If the heroes are still level 1 when they defeat this encounter, they each gain a bonus of 40 XP due to the additional challenge.

Zolgran's Treasure

@Actor[p84EOttaNannSP3y]{Zolgran's Treasure}

The ledge the throne sits on also serves as Zolgran's personal resting area. A straw pallet rests here, like those in @UUID[.0vJpmu4QJ7RgYLi2]{Area 17}. Heroes who examine the out-of-place throne can match its design to the decor of @UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]{Area 11} on the floor above, which is where the kobolds took it from. Most importantly, there's an old, rusty iron chest. Atop this chest is a large, broken eggshell that's almost 2 feet tall. Ivory in color, the shell has green veins running through it, and it’s clear that the pieces of eggshell worn by the boss and many of the kobolds here came from this egg. Although it’s still not entirely clear what was inside, there are large claw marks, bigger than any kobold could make, down one side of the shell.

Inside the Chest

The chest is locked, but Zolgran has the key tied at her waist. If the heroes don’t find the key, a character with a thieves' toolkit can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:25]{Thievery skill check}, and the lock opens on a success! If the players manage to open the chest, reveal the loot actor to them on the map.

Inside the chest are some of the more interesting treasure that the kobolds found during their exploration of these tunnels. The treasure includes a silver bracelet with a fish pattern worth 5 gp, a very old map that depicts some strange-looking dungeon, a smoking sword with a dwarven face carved into the hilt, a wand of heal, 2 healing potions, and a masquerade scarf.

Are we Done?

If the PCs defeat the kobolds and their boss, they might return to the Otari Fishery. If they decide not to explore any further, the adventure can easily end here. Tamily happily pays the heroes for completing the job, even if she does wonder what was in that mighty egg. She's also curious as to what happened to all the fish, as the kobolds couldn’t possibly have eaten it all, but such mysteries will have to wait for another day.

Audio Cue

If your players decide to press on, you can use the Dragon Soundboard effects "Wyrmling Growl Distant" to warn them of the imminent danger of continuing before they have prepared. 

In this case—or if the heroes don’t end up fleeing from the next encounter—the young dragon in the kobolds' care survives! Eventually the dragon leaves the cave and starts hunting in the countryside, becoming a menace for years to come. Fortunately, dragons grow in power very slowly. The heroes might find themselves chasing down this beast in the future! If they’ve gained a few more levels, they’ll have an edge in the fight.

More likely, though, the players might push on to explore the next cavern—@UUID[.KMTBj18whqvjGZBz]{Area 19}. That encounter is the most dangerous fight of the entire adventure, so feel free to encourage the heroes to rest if they’re out of limited resources, such as spells.

Mushroom Grotto.name: 蘑菇洞穴 Mushroom Grotto
Mushroom Grotto.text:
这个洞穴是由狗头人部落孵化的幼年角龙的巢穴。当英雄们进入房间时，大声朗读以下内容。

巨大的黄色蘑菇覆盖着这个巨大洞穴的地表，有些高达10尺。它们似乎发出苍白的光，让整个房间笼罩在诡异的光芒下。破碎的木桶残骸散落在蘑菇的底部——桶被撕开，但里面的东西已不见踪影。在房间远处的另一侧，有什么东西在阴影里动了动，传来一声微弱的低吼。

高耸的蘑菇挡住了房间远端的视线，但英雄们可能会试图爬上蘑菇看得更清楚。由于它们的伞盖很滑，因此攀爬蘑菇是个棘手的任务，需要成功通过@Check[athletics|dc:20|showDC:all]检定。

给英雄们一个准备的机会，但当他们中的一人爬上蘑菇顶端或到达房间的中心时，巨龙就会离开远处角落里的巢穴并发动攻击。将巨龙的指示物在地图上揭示出来，并大声朗读以下内容。

一条绿色的角龙跃入视野，虽然这头野兽的体型并不比你大多少，但巨大的皮质双翼与咔哒作响的巨颚，让这只雏龙看起来宛如一头上古巨龙。它用狡黠的眼睛盯着你，鼻中喷出一团黄色蒸汽。伴随着一声凶猛的咆哮，巨龙猛冲上前发动攻击！

让玩家以察觉进行先攻检定（但正在躲藏的英雄改为以隐秘进行先攻检定），同时你为巨龙进行察觉检定来决定它的先攻。

巨龙是游戏中最凶猛、也最具挑战性的对手之一；尽管这只还只是幼龙，它仍是致命的威胁。巨龙会在与英雄的战斗中使用多种能力，并且对这座洞穴有强烈的领地意识。不过，狗头人已训练这只雏龙留在此区域内，因此若英雄们需要恢复，仍能选择撤退。

遭遇 Encounter

@Actor[WPsgrCUSFCqgDvJi]

毒息 Poison Breath

巨龙可以花费2个动作，吐出一团致命气体，以巨龙的空间为起点，对@Template[cone|distance:30|traits:evocation,poison,arcane]范围内的所有生物造成毒素伤害。

这次攻击可能会给队伍带来厄运，但这只幼龙缺乏有效运用毒息的经验。它不会试图用这次攻击覆盖所有英雄，而是只专注于最近的对手。一旦巨龙使用了毒息能力，就无法在[[/r 1d4]]轮内再次使用它，除非它在一次打击中打出一次大成功或大失败。

特殊攻击 Special Attacks

巨龙最喜欢的战术（也是最可靠的攻击方式）是先向前行走，然后使用龙之狂怒。该能力让野兽花费2个动作，以任意顺序进行2次爪击打击和1次尾击打击。在龙之狂怒中进行的第二次与第三次打击会承受多重攻击减值：第二次打击为-5（若第二次攻击使用爪击，则为-4），第三次打击为-10（若使用爪击，则为-8）。

巨龙还拥有特殊的扭曲之尾反应。当10尺内的某个生物尝试移动时，巨龙可以在该轮花费其反应，对该敌人进行一次尾击打击。若命中，目标停止移动并失去该动作的剩余部分（不过目标若愿意，仍可用另一个动作再次移动）。

经验值 Experience Points

一旦英雄们击败了巨龙，奖励每位英雄120XP。

宝藏 Treasure

@Actor[mygajPl08HHktFRV]

房间东北角的岩架上存放着狗头人献给巨龙的宝藏。英雄们甚至可以从地面瞥见这些宝藏，但任何想爬上岩架的人都必须成功通过@Check[athletics|dc:15|showDC:all]检定。

岩架上放着一个小箱子和一大堆钱币，总计429cp、63sp与18gp。钱堆顶端还有一颗巨大的绿宝石，隐约看起来像巨龙的眼睛，可卖得20gp。

通向地面的隧道 Tunnel to the Surface

蘑菇洞窟的后方有一条隧道，通往一段漫长而蜿蜒的通道。若英雄们沿此探索，会发现通道缓缓向上倾斜，并能感受到从该方向吹来的清新微风。沿着这条路走了一个多小时后，他们会从奥塔里镇外一处峡谷中的小洞穴钻出。洞口周围的营地遗迹表明，狗头人曾在这里停留了一段时间，然后才进入镇子下方进行他们的恶作剧。

冒险总结 Wrapping Up

凭借十足的勇气与一点好运，冒险者们希望能在与狗头人及其“宠物”的遭遇中存活下来，并以凯旋英雄的身份回到城镇！塔米莉在得知威胁已经解除后真正松了一口气，尤其是在了解到它究竟有多危险之后。

在接下来的几周里，英雄们的事迹传遍全镇，他们很快便会获得更多冒险工作的机会。此后的冒险由你——GM——来决定；不过，如果你的团想继续使用同一批英雄，你或许会发现@UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw]中的资源很有帮助。在这种情况下，你可能会对《奥塔里的麻烦（Troubles in Otari）》冒险或《憎恶秘藏（Abomination Vaults）》冒险路径感兴趣，它们都会延续奥塔里的众多角色故事。



原文:

This cavern is the home of the juvenile horned dragon hatched by the kobold band. When the heroes enter the room, read the following aloud.

Towering yellow mushrooms cover the floor of this vast cave, some reaching over ten feet in height. They seem to emit a pale light, giving the entire chamber an eerie glow. Shattered remnants of barrels—torn open with their contents nowhere to be seen—lay scattered around the base of the mushrooms. Somewhere off on the far side of the chamber, something stirs, and a faint snarl comes from the shadows.

The towering mushrooms block the view of the far side of the room, but the heroes might try to climb the mushrooms to get a better look. Due to their slippery caps, climbing a mushroom is a tricky task, requiring a successful @Check[type:athletics|dc:20|showDC:all]{Athletics skill check}.

Give the heroes a chance to prepare themselves, but when one of them climbs atop a mushroom or reaches the center of the room, the dragon leaves their lair in the far corner to attack. Reveal the dragon's token on the map and read the following aloud.

A green horned dragon leaps into view, and although the beast isn't much larger than you, large leathery wings and snapping jaws make the hatchling look like an ancient wyrm. The creature gazes at you with cunning eyes and snorts a cloud of yellow vapor. With a fierce roar, the dragon charges forward to attack!

Ask the players to roll Perception for initiative (but heroes who were hiding roll Stealth instead) while you roll Perception to determine the dragon's initiative.

Dragons are one of the fiercest and most challenging types of opponents in the game, and while only a juvenile, this one is still a deadly threat. The dragon uses many abilities in the fight against the heroes and is fiercely territorial of the cave. However, the kobolds have trained the hatchling to stay in this area, so the heroes can retreat if they need to recover.

Encounter

@Actor[WPsgrCUSFCqgDvJi]{Juvenile Horned Dragon}

Poison Breath

The dragon can spend 2 actions to breathe out a cloud of deadly gas that deals poison damage to everyone in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|traits:evocation,poison,arcane]{30-foot cone} starting from the dragon's space.

This attack could spell doom for the party, but the juvenile dragon doesn’t have much experience using their poison breath effectively. The dragon doesn't try to catch all the heroes with this attack, but focuses on just the nearest opponent. Once the dragon uses the poison breath ability, they can’t use it again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds or until they get a critical hit on a Strike.

Special Attacks

The dragon's favorite tactic (and most reliable attack) is to Stride forward and then use Draconic Frenzy, an ability that allows the beast to spend 2 actions to make two claw Strikes and a tail Strike in any order. The second and third Strikes during the Draconic Frenzy take the multiple attack penalty: –5 on the second attack (or –4 if the second attack uses a claw Strike), and –10 on the third attack (or –8 if using a claw).

The dragon also has a special Twisting Tail reaction. When someone within 10 feet tries to move, the dragon can spend their reaction for that round to make a tail Strike against that foe. If the dragon hits, the target stops moving and loses the rest of that action (though the target can use another action to move again if they want).

Experience Points

Once the heroes manage to defeat the dragon, award each hero 120 XP.

Treasure

@Actor[mygajPl08HHktFRV]{Dragon's Lair}

The ledge in the northeast corner of the room holds the treasure the kobolds offered to the dragon. The heroes can catch a glimpse of this treasure even from the floor, but anyone who wants to climb up to the ledge must succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:15|showDC:all]{Athletics skill check}.

Atop the ledge sits a small chest and a huge pile of coins, totalling 429 cp, 63 sp, and 18 gp. There's also a single giant emerald atop the heap that vaguely looks like the dragon's eye, which can be sold for 20 gp.

Tunnel to the Surface

The back of the mushroom grotto has a tunnel leading to a long, winding passageway. If the heroes explore this way, they find that it gently slopes upward, and they can feel a fresh breeze coming from this direction. After following this path for over an hour, they emerge from a small cave in a ravine outside the town of Otari. Remnants of a camp around the cave’s entrance indicate that the kobolds had stayed here for some time before heading under the town to work their mischief.

Wrapping Up

With a lot of courage and a bit of luck, the adventurers hopefully survived their encounter with the kobolds and their “pet,” returning to the town as triumphant heroes! Tamily feels truly relieved to learn that the threat is gone, especially after learning just how dangerous it was.

Over the coming weeks, news of the heroes' exploits travel all across town, and soon they receive opportunities for more adventuring work. Such adventures are up to you, the GM, to determine, but you might find the resources in the @UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw]{Otari Gazetteer} useful if your group would like to continue with the same heroes! In that case, you might be interested in the Troubles in Otari adventure or the Abomination Vaults adventure path, both of which continue the stories of Otari's many characters.

Setting the Scene.name: 设置场景 Setting the Scene
Setting the Scene.text:
当每位玩家都选好了他们的英雄，而且所有人都准备好开始游戏时，就是时候开始了。确保每位英雄的指示物都放在第1层底部、靠近楼梯的位置，紧挨着@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]。

当大家都准备好后，从阅读下方绿色文字开始，以设置场景。

海滨小镇奥塔里以鲜鱼和技艺娴熟的水手而闻名，但最重要的是，它是一座大型伐木城镇，为附近的大都会艾巴萨罗姆提供宝贵木材。但对你们来说，奥塔里是家。你们从小在码头上玩耍，在附近的树林里迷路，听着远方旅人讲述奇幻故事——可怕巨龙与高洁骑士的传说。那样的冒险似乎总是遥不可及——直到今天。
奥塔里开始流传着消息：奥塔里渔场那边出了问题。有人说，地下室里潜伏着某种野兽，正在啃食储存的咸鱼。人们担心，吃鱼的东西要是饿得更狠了，下一步就会来吃渔夫！
你们收到了渔场主人塔米莉·坦德威尔的一封信。信中是她绝望的求助。镇卫队正忙着保护伐木工，她需要几位勇敢之人深入她仓库的地下室，终结那头正在大啖她存鱼的野兽！你们有勇气直面潜伏在奥塔里之下的威胁吗？

分享图片 Sharing Artwork

 知识库：日志条目

当你朗读完上述文字时，你可能会想向玩家展示塔米莉的图片，让他们看看究竟是谁在请求他们接下这项任务。

好在这非常容易！奥塔里的每个主要地点与NPC都有一份专门的资料手册，用来描述其经营场所与个性。在提供如何扮演塔米莉的建议之外，@UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw.JournalEntryPage.YscCX6Wrt1ZTiyhk]这份手册还包含了她图片的链接。

要向玩家展示日志中的图片，你只需打开它，并在页眉点击“展示给玩家”。无论该图片是独立页面，还是嵌入在文字页面中，都同样适用。举例来说，如果你想展示嵌入在奥塔里渔场日志里的小插图，你可以点击该插图，然后以同样方式点击“展示给玩家”。

当你读完之后，让玩家互相介绍他们的英雄，包括他们的名字、族裔、背景和职业。玩家也可以进一步描述他们的英雄外貌、携带的装备，以及（或许）一些个性特征。

介绍结束后，确保玩家的指示物都在区域1通往地下室的楼梯上。站位顺序由他们自行决定，但更明智的做法是让生命值更多或护甲等级更高的职业站在前面。确保有一名角色位于楼梯底部，然后启用场景，并继续阅读@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]。



原文:

Once each player has chosen their hero and everyone is ready to play, it’s time to begin the game. Make sure that the tokens for each hero are placed by the stairway at the bottom of floor 1, next to @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{Area 01}.

Once everyone is ready to begin, start by reading the text in green below to set the scene.

The small seaside town of Otari is known for its fresh fish and skilled sailors, but above all, it’s a big logging town, providing valuable wood to the nearby metropolis of Absalom. But for you, Otari is home. You grew up playing on the docks, getting lost in the nearby woods, and hearing the fantastical stories of travelers from faraway lands, tales of terrifying dragons and virtuous knights. Such adventure always seemed so distant- until today.
Word has begun to spread around Otari that there's a problem down at the Otari Fishery. Some are saying that some sort of beast is lurking in the basement, feeding on the stores of salted fish. Folks are worried that whatever is eating the fish might get hungry enough to eat the fishers next!
You've received a letter from Tamily Tanderveil, the owner of the Fishery. Inside is a desperate plea for help. With the town guard busy protecting the loggers, she needs a few brave souls to venture down into the basement of her warehouse and put an end to the beast that's feasting on her fish! Do you have the courage to face the menace under Otari?

Sharing Artwork

 Knowledge Base: Journal Entries

As you read the above text, you might want to show your players a picture of Tamily so they can see who’s asking them to take on this task.

Thankfully, that's very easy! Each major location and NPC in Otari has a dedicated handout describing their place of business and personality. As well as advice on how to portray Tamily, the @UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw.JournalEntryPage.YscCX6Wrt1ZTiyhk]{Otari Fishery} handout includes a link to a picture of her.

To show a journal image to your players, you need only open it and click on "Show Players" in the header. This works whether the artwork is a dedicated page or is embedded in a text page. For instance, if you'd like to show them the vignette that's embedded in the Otari Fishery journal, you can click on it and then click "Show Players" in the exact same way. 

After you finish reading, have the players introduce their heroes to one another, including their name, ancestry, background, and class. Players might also want to describe what their hero looks like, what kind of gear they carry, and maybe a bit about their personality.

After the introductions, make sure the player tokens are on the stairs leading down into the basement in Area 1. The order is up to them to decide, but it's smart to put characters with more Hit Points or a higher Armor Class in front. Make sure that one character is at the bottom of the stairs, then activate the scene and move on to the journal entry for @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{Area 01}.

Pathfinder Society.name: 开拓者协会 Pathfinder Society
Pathfinder Society.text:
在开拓者协会中游玩《奥塔里地下的威胁》

 Paizo：新手包认可（Sanctioning）  Paizo：开拓者协会

《Pathfinder 新手包》中收录的冒险“奥塔里地下的威胁 Menace Under Otari”已获准用于开拓者协会组织游戏。用于主持该冒险与使用冒险记录表（chronicle sheet）的规则，可在上方链接页面从 Paizo 免费下载。

在开拓者协会中游玩冒险《奥塔里地下的威胁 Menace Under Otari》的限制之一（见《新手包认可》指南中“Running the 冒险”一节）是：用于该冒险的角色必须使用《新手包》中更为精简的规则构建。你可以使用预制的标志性角色，也可以创建属于你自己的新英雄。
